comment: /**  * Allows to register of a custom circuit breaker.  */
code: /**  * Allows to register of a custom circuit breaker.  */ public abstract void registerBreaker(BreakerSettings breakerSettings).

comment: /**  * @return the breaker that can be used to register estimates against  */
code: /**  * @return the breaker that can be used to register estimates against  */ public abstract CircuitBreaker getBreaker(String name).
/**  * @return stats about all breakers  */ public abstract AllCircuitBreakerStats stats().
/**  * @return stats about a specific breaker  */ public abstract CircuitBreakerStats stats(String name).
